name: Gump (itch) (Workshop-Alternatum)
description:
Join doobie in his misadventure along the land of gump while he fights with the Quibbles to keep his journey. there are big mechanics these quibbles have . you have to defeat each one of them to pass through the vallies of Gump. each time doobie gets into his lab he invents something new. he fights on with his mind and heart to go on to find the end of the journey to the yellow submarine.

the game has a custom game section where on finishing levels you can choose your own enemy and play as long as you want to on totaly new levels. the weapon upgrade section is mulitlayered with puzzles and gun menu. you can buy guns and upgrades but you can also play the puzzle game and experiment with it see if you can unlock the upgrades on its own through the power of intuition. and dont click on mad by the way. wait for events to happen. and wait for menus to load.  mad click click click go on forever.
